17 #define I2C_BUS "/dev/i2c-1"
18 
19 
20 int main(int argc, char **argv)
21 {
22 
23  int fd;
24 
25  if ((fd = open(I2C_BUS, O_RDWR)) < 0)
26  {
27  // Open port for reading and writing
28 
29  fprintf(stderr, "Failed to open i2c bus %s\n", I2C_BUS);
30 
31  exit(1);
32  }
33 
34  I2C i2c1((char*) I2C_BUS);
35 
36  ros::init(argc, argv, "talker");
37  ros::NodeHandle n;
38  ros::Publisher pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("navigation_module", 2);
39  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
40 
41  const bool DEBUG = n.hasParam("/talker_node/DEBUG");
42  const bool CALIBRATED = n.hasParam("/talker_node/CALIBRATED");
43 
44 
45  static ros::Publisher acceleration_pub;
46  static ros::Publisher rotation_pub;
47  static ros::Publisher magnetism_pub;
48  static ros::Publisher euler_pub;
49 
50 
51  if (DEBUG)
52  {
53  acceleration_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("acceleration", 1000);
54  rotation_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("rotation", 1000);
55  magnetism_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("magnetism", 1000);
56  euler_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("euler", 1000);
57  }
58 
59 
60  MPU6050 imu;
61  QMC5883 compass;
62  MS5837_30BA bar;
63  MadgwickFilter ahrs;
64 
65  imu.startup(i2c1, fd);
66  compass.startup(i2c1, fd);
67  bar.startup(i2c1, fd);
68  bar.set_conversion(bar.Pa);
69 
70  float ax, ay, az;
71  float gx, gy, gz;
72  float mx, my, mz;
73  float axoffset, ayoffset, azoffset, gxoffset, gyoffset, gzoffset;
74  float mxoffset, myoffset, mzoffset, mxscale, myscale, mzscale;
75 
76  while (ros::ok())
77  {
78  imu.get_binary_data();
79  compass.get_binary_data();
80  bar.get_binary_data();
81 
82  imu.Accelerometer::get_sample();
83  imu.Gyroscope::get_sample();
84  compass.get_sample();
85 
86  imu.Accelerometer::get_3d_magnitude(ax, ay, az);
87  imu.Gyroscope::get_3d_magnitude(gx, gy, gz);
88  compass.get_3d_magnitude(mx, my, mz);
89 
90  ax = -ax; ay = -ay; az = -az;
91  gx = -gx; gy = -gy; gz = -gz;
92  mx = -mx; my = -my; mz = -mz;
93 
94  if (CALIBRATED)
95  {
96  n.getParam("/Accelerometer/axoffset", axoffset);
97  n.getParam("/Accelerometer/ayoffset", ayoffset);
98  n.getParam("/Accelerometer/azoffset", azoffset);
99  n.getParam("/Gyroscope/gxoffset", gxoffset);
100  n.getParam("/Gyroscope/gyoffset", gyoffset);
101  n.getParam("/Gyroscope/gzoffset", gzoffset);
102  n.getParam("/Magnetometer/mxoffset", mxoffset);
103  n.getParam("/Magnetometer/myoffset", myoffset);
104  n.getParam("/Magnetometer/mzoffset", mzoffset);
105  n.getParam("/Magnetometer/mxscale", mxscale);
106  n.getParam("/Magnetometer/myscale", myscale);
107  n.getParam("/Magnetometer/mzscale", mzscale);
108  // std::cout << axoffset << " " << ayoffset << " " << azoffset << std::endl;
109  ax = ax - axoffset;
110  ay = ay - ayoffset;
111  az = az - azoffset;
112  gx = gx - gxoffset;
113  gy = gy - gyoffset;
114  gz = gz - gzoffset;
115  mx = (mx - mxoffset) * mxscale;
116  my = (my - myoffset) * myscale;
117  mz = (mz - mzoffset) * mzscale;
118  }
119 
120 
121  ahrs.update(gx, gy, gz, ax, ay, az, -mx, my, mz);
122 
123  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped msg;
124 
125  if (DEBUG)
126  {
127  geometry_msgs::Vector3 acceleration_msg;
128  geometry_msgs::Vector3 rotation_msg;
129  geometry_msgs::Vector3 magnetism_msg;
130  geometry_msgs::Vector3 euler_msg;
131 
132  acceleration_msg.x = ax;
133  acceleration_msg.y = ay;
134  acceleration_msg.z = az;
135 
136  rotation_msg.x = gx;
137  rotation_msg.y = gy;
138  rotation_msg.z = gz;
139 
140  magnetism_msg.x = mx;
141  magnetism_msg.y = my;
142  magnetism_msg.z = mz;
143 
144  euler_msg.x = ahrs.getRoll();
145  euler_msg.y = ahrs.getPitch();
146  euler_msg.z = ahrs.getYaw();
147 
148  acceleration_pub.publish(acceleration_msg);
149  rotation_pub.publish(rotation_msg);
150  magnetism_pub.publish(magnetism_msg);
151  euler_pub.publish(euler_msg);
152  }
153 
154  msg.pose.orientation.w = ahrs.q0;
155  msg.pose.orientation.x = ahrs.q1;
156  msg.pose.orientation.y = ahrs.q2;
157  msg.pose.orientation.z = ahrs.q3;
158 
159  msg.pose.position.x = 0;
160  msg.pose.position.y = 0;
161  msg.pose.position.z = bar.getDepth();
162 
163  pub.publish(msg);
164  ros::spinOnce();
165  loop_rate.sleep();
166  }
167  return 0;
168 }
